title: I Am Chosen
shortDescription: Memorize 1 Peter 2:9 and reflect on being chosen by God.
learningGoal: claim identity as chosen and explore purpose
childCopy: Find the 'chosen' stones and write your name on one.
matureNote: Explore election language sensitively and focus on vocation and calling.
acceptanceCriteria: Player explains a simple way they are chosen to serve.

title: I Am Never Alone
shortDescription: Reflect on Hebrews 13:5 and practice trusting God's presence.
childCopy: Help an NPC who feels alone by reminding them of God's presence.
matureNote: Discuss pastoral practices for loneliness and spiritual support.
acceptanceCriteria: Player identifies two ways God is present in hard times.

title: I Am Redeemed
shortDescription: Study Galatians 3:13 and reflect on redemption in Christ.
learningGoal: understand redemption and freedom in Christ
childCopy: Solve a small puzzle that shows being rescued and set free.
matureNote: Theology of redemption and its implications for identity and mission.
acceptanceCriteria: Player retells the story of redemption and names one personal application.

title: I Am a Friend of God
shortDescription: Explore John 15:15 and practice friendship with Jesus through obedience.
learningGoal: internalize friendship with God and respond in obedience
childCopy: Complete small tasks that show friendship and trust.
matureNote: Consider spiritual friendship and disciplines in Mature Mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Player lists one way to be a friend of God through obedience.

title: I Am God's Ambassador
shortDescription: Learn 2 Corinthians 5:20 and practice sharing reconciling words.
learningGoal: understand ambassador role and practice reconciliation
childCopy: Help two characters reconcile by choosing kind, truthful words.
matureNote: Discuss representing Christ in public life and ethical speech.
acceptanceCriteria: Player demonstrates a reconciling response in dialog.

title: I Am Free in Christ
shortDescription: Memorize Galatians 5:1 and reflect on spiritual freedom.
learningGoal: understand freedom in Christ and live accordingly
childCopy: Make choices that show healthy freedom and responsibility.
matureNote: Discuss liberty and responsibility; avoid antinomianism.
acceptanceCriteria: Player selects responsible choices that reflect freedom in Christ.

title: I Am Royalty
shortDescription: Explore 1 Peter 2:9 and consider what it means to be part of God's royal family.
learningGoal: embrace dignity and responsibility in Christ
childCopy: Complete a stewardship task that reflects royal responsibility.
matureNote: Discuss priesthood and royalty metaphors in Scripture.
acceptanceCriteria: Player identifies one royal responsibility they can practice.
